meta.name: Acting Good
meta.description: After a botched attempt to move to Winnipeg, Paul retreats back to his eccentric family in the fly-in community of Grouse Lake First Nation.

videos.title: Just Fok'n Missing Her
videos.overview: After falling flat on his face in the city of Winnipeg, Paul returns home to the fly-in community of Grouse Lake.

videos.title: Goosed by a Moose
videos.overview: Paul attempts to win his ex-girlfriend Rose back with the promise of a big surprise.

videos.title: Three Nobodies
videos.overview: Paul attempts to win his ex-girlfriend Rose back with the promise of a big surprise.

videos.title: High Rollers
videos.overview: Paul and the gang fly out of Grouse Lake full of excitement for their big adventure.

videos.title: A Steps Too Far
videos.overview: Paul's new jeans get in between him and his dating life. Meanwhile the coffee in Grouse Lake is being held hostage.

videos.title: Battle in the Bush
videos.overview: The annual Battle in the Bush returns, but when the most infamous wrestler misses the plane, someone must step in.

videos.title: Under the "B" for Breakup
videos.overview: Jo bets Paul $1,000 that his rekindled relationship with Rose won't last a week.

videos.title: Fresh Meat
videos.overview: Paul goes into a tailspin when he discovers his mom Agnes and Ed are dating.

videos.title: Mr. Witch Face
videos.overview: A tabloid journalist arrives and tries to fabricate a story about a community gripped with fear.

videos.title: The Jig is Up
videos.overview: Jo signs Paul and herself up for the Treaty Days pairs jigging contest.

videos.title: One Flew Out of The Kookum's Nest
videos.overview: Paul tries to slip back into his community unnoticed after falling flat on his face in Winnipeg.

videos.title: To Catch a Rummager
videos.overview: The race for Chief of Grouse Lake gets nasty; Paul finds refuge in an unlikely place.

videos.title: Fasting and Furious
videos.overview: Fed up with Paul's behaviour at the elders' lodge, Gramps takes him deep into the bush for an overnight fast.

videos.title: L'il Tonys in the Mist
videos.overview: Jo attempts to gain election votes, while Paul teams up with Stephen Harper to win Rose back.

videos.title: The Flighting Grouse
videos.overview: An online nemesis shows up in person to confront Paul. Meanwhile, Health Week introduces a potential new romantic interest for Jo.

videos.title: Roger That
videos.overview: Roger Laughingstick quits his job in protest of Jo's chiefdom; Paul stumbles across the DJ's memoir.

videos.title: One Point for the Road
videos.overview: The Grouse Lake volleyball team seeks to finally score a single point.

videos.title: Dabs of Thunder
videos.overview: The community comes together for Monster Bingo, reheating old rivalries and sparking new ones.

videos.title: The Wolf of Paul Street
videos.overview: An impending wedding and an untimely event forces Paul to finally grow up.

videos.title: A Man for All Shack Up Seasons
videos.overview: A wedding and funeral bring Grouse Lake together; Paul continues his journey for love.

videos.title: The Keemootch Room
videos.overview: Paul's attempt to escape the pressures of starting a family spirals out of control, thanks to some scheming Elders.

videos.title: Babby Daddy Games
videos.overview: Paul and Rose take an unusual (and competitive) route to pregnancy, while Jo's attempts at political damage control backfire.

videos.title: The Reverse Moo
videos.overview: Paul goes back to high school but faces an old nemesis, while Jo and Logan team up to get rid of a troublesome nurse.

videos.title: Grouse Lake Grouse Break
videos.overview: Paul confronts his fears during the annual grouse hunt, while Chickadee and Logan face off in a petty bet.

videos.title: Bitterns vs Butterns
videos.overview: A long-standing feud between the Bitterns and a rival family comes to a head at a Chiefs conference.

videos.title: The Scourge Of The Screen
videos.overview: Paul tries to slip back into his community unnoticed after falling flat on his face in Winnipeg.

videos.title: Secrets Lies and Meatballs
videos.overview: Paul tries to slip back into his community unnoticed after falling flat on his face in Winnipeg.

videos.title: Pretty Fly (For A White Dad)
videos.overview: Paul's bottomless lie-hole leads to an unexpected reunion with his dad, while Jo feels smothered by Logan's love.

videos.title: Paul In Paul Out
videos.overview: To finish high school, Paul must go undercover and bust a rubber boot bootlegging ring.

videos.title: Oh Ho'Leh Night
videos.overview: When Santa crashes in Grouse Lake, it's up to the rez to save Christmas.
